# Check the duplicated column with Close, adj Close
xlm_df['Adj Close'].duplicated().any()
source.b0648f55:
# Drop the duplicated column
xlm_df.drop('Adj Close', axis=1, inplace=True)
source.b4b19b0d:
# Figure style initialization
plt.style.use('seaborn-darkgrid')

# Color palette
palette = plt.get_cmap('Set1')

# Line plots
plt.figure(figsize=(20,15))
num=0
for column in xlm_df.drop('Date', axis=1):
    num+=1
    plt.subplot(3,3,num)
   
    plt.plot(xlm_df['Date'], xlm_df[column], marker='', color=palette(num), linewidth=0.9, label=column)
    
    if num in range(7):
        plt.tick_params(labelbottom='off')
    if num not in [1,4,7] :
        plt.tick_params(labelleft='off')
 
    # Title
    plt.title(column, loc='center', fontsize=12, fontweight=0, color=palette(num))
